Summary: Reported to cause Leber congenital amaurosis in a recessive manner, causing night blindness and vision loss. This effect is reported in ClinVar by OMIM (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/clinvar/RCV000002131/). Studying 110 unrelated patients, Perrault et al 2004 (PMID: 15322982) report seeing this variant once.
